OrgName: Westat, Inc. and all its wholly-owned U.S. subsidiaries
activities: Westat, Inc. and its wholly-owned U.S. subsidiaries may receive personal information about research subjects, patients, investigators, staff, service providers, and healthcare professionals in support of our research operations.  The data collected and analyzed is typically encrypted or coded and transferred and stored in a manner designed to avoid unauthorized access, misuse, accidental disclosure or destruction of personal identifiers.
personaldata: off-line, on-line, or manually processed data to include human resources data
